description: The fund invests at least 80% of its net assets in financial instruments, securities of the index, and ETFs that track the index and other financial instruments that provide daily leveraged exposure to the index or to ETFs that track the index. The index is a modified equal-weighted index that is designed to measure the performance of the equity securities of companies in the S&P Total Market Index that are classified by the GICS as being in the metals and mining industry. It is non-diversified.
name: Direxion Daily Metals & Mining Bull 2X Shares
